shots.prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a narrow, rain-slicked alleyway in Ho Chi Minh City at midnight. Neon signs cast a deep burgundy glow, reflecting off the wet pavement. A handsome man, 30s, with short dark hair, piercing blue eyes, wearing a classic, slightly damp navy trench coat and dark trousers, walks with purpose, clutching a worn leather satchel. Deep navy shadows dominate the scene, punctuated by the flickering burgundy neon. Realistic, gritty atmosphere. Cinematic lighting, volumetric fog.
shots.negative: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, inconsistent character appearance, poor lighting, bad composition, cartoonish, overexposed, underexposed, bright daylight

His face is etched with weariness. He stops and scans the oppressive darkness ahead, his hand tightening on his worn leather satchel. Deep navy shadows, flickering burgundy neon light. Realistic, gritty atmosphere. Cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field.

Realistic, gritty atmosphere. Cinematic lighting, dynamic motion.
